dashboard.logoutConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to quit?
dashboard.logoutConfirmDescription: You're about to find the diamonds! One last spin could be the winner.

games.blackjack.description: Get closer to 21. Dealer stands on 17.
games.blackjack.objective: Your hand must be closer to 21 than the dealer's, without going over 21.
games.blackjack.valueFace: Face cards (J, Q, K): Worth 10 points each.
games.blackjack.valueAce: Ace (A): Worth 1 or 11, whichever is more favorable.
games.blackjack.rule2: You receive 2 cards. The dealer receives 2, one face down.
games.blackjack.rule4: If your score exceeds 21, you automatically lose (Bust).
games.blackjack.rule5: The dealer must draw until their hand totals 17 or more.
games.blackjack.rule6: A Blackjack (an Ace and a 10-value card on the initial deal) pays 3 to 2 (1.5x your bet).
games.roulette.loseMessage: The number is {number}. Better luck next time.
games.roulette.objective: Guess which number, color, or group the ball will land on to win.
games.roulette.straightBetDesc: Bet on a single number. The highest payout! (35 to 1)
games.roulette.colorBetDesc: Bet on the color of the winning number. (1 to 1)
games.roulette.evenOddBetDesc: Bet on whether the number will be even or odd. (1 to 1)
games.roulette.rule1: Set your Amount: Use the field
games.roulette.rule2: Place your Bets: Click on the numbers or zones on the board.
games.roulette.rule3: Start the Game: When ready, press
games.roulette.rule4: Clear Bets: If you make a mistake, press
games.roulette.rule4_cont: to remove all your bets before spinning.
games.slots.twoInLineMessage: Two in a line! You win ${amount}!
games.slots.objective: Line up the symbols on the center line to win prizes. The bet is always 10!
games.slots.twoInLinePayout: The prize for 2 in a line is half the multiplier.
games.poker.title: Texas Hold'em Poker
games.poker.description: 1v1 against the dealer. Do you have what it takes?
games.poker.objective: Get the best 5-card poker hand by combining your 2 private cards with the 5 community cards on the table.
games.poker.rule1_ante: You choose your bet and press Deal. You are dealt 2 cards face up. The dealer receives 2 face down.
games.poker.rule2_bet: - Place an additional bet equal to your Ante to continue.
games.poker.rule2_check: - You don't bet more, but you stay in the hand.
games.poker.rule2_fold: - You fold and lose your initial bet.
games.poker.rule3_community: If you continue, the 5 community cards will be revealed in three stages (3, then 1, and finally 1).
games.poker.rule4_showdown: At the end, the dealer reveals their cards. The player with the best 5-card hand wins the entire pot.
games.poker.bettingRoundMessage: Betting round. Bet, Check, or Fold?
games.poker.flopMessage: Flop. The first 3 cards are revealed.
games.poker.turnMessage: Turn. The fourth card is revealed.
games.poker.riverMessage: River. The last card is revealed. Showdown!
games.poker.foldMessage: You folded. The dealer wins the pot.
